TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IStyleSheet

summary.span: 定义某个类为支持样式规则的创建而必须实现的方法。

span.span: Defines the methods that a class must implement in order to support the creation of style rules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此接口的类可以用它来支持样式规则的创建。Classes that implement this interface can use it to support the creation of style rules. 若要自定义级联样式表的创建和注册的方式，必须创建实现此接口的类。To customize the way cascading style sheets are created and registered, you must create a class that implements this interface. 类实现此接口以供 ASP.NET 通过属性。The class implements this interface for use by ASP.NET through the property. > [!NOTE] > 不支持添加或修改以编程方式在异步回发期间的样式或样式规则。Adding or modifying styles or style rules programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported. 当将 AJAX 功能添加到 ASP.NET 网页时，异步回发更新页面区域内的而不更新整个页面。When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Microsoft Ajax 概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb)。For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用的实现若要演示如何以编程方式创建新的样式规则和注册自定义对象。The following code example uses the implementation of to demonstrate programmatically creating a new style rule and registering the custom object. 在此示例中，自定义的第一部分对象， `labelStyle`、 创建和注册当前位置 (URL)。In the first part of the example, a custom object, `labelStyle`, is created and then registered for the current location (URL). 然后`label1`标签调用方法，以便`labelStyle`样式应用于`label1`标签。Then the `label1` label calls the method so that the `labelStyle` style is applied to the `label1` label. 该示例的第二部分定义另一个自定义对象， `bodyStyle`，并设置其属性来创建新的样式规则。The second part of the example defines another custom object, `bodyStyle`,and sets its properties to create a new style rule. > [!NOTE] > 此类主要面向开发人员想要创建的自定义实现。This class is intended primarily for developers that want to create a custom implementation. 此示例演示了.NET Framework 提供的实现。This example demonstrates the implementation provided by the .NET Framework. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet/CS/istylesheetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet/VB/istylesheetvb.aspx#1)] 下面是在前面的示例网页的代码隐藏文件。The following is the code-behind file for the Web page in the preceding example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheet/CS/istylesheetcs.aspx.cs#2)]

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CreateStyleRule(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style style, class System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService urlResolver, string selector) cil managed
public: void CreateStyleRule(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ style, System::Web::UI::IUrlResolutionService ^ urlResolver, System::String ^ selector);
abstract member CreateStyleRule : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style * System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService * string -> unit

param.name: style
param.span: 要添加到嵌入式样式表中的样式规则。

span.span: The style rule to be added to the embedded style sheet.

param.name: urlResolver
param.span: 一个实现了 的对象，它包含当前位置 (URL) 的上下文信息。

span.span: An -implemented object that contains the context information for the current location (URL).

param.name: selector
param.span: HTML 页中受到样式影响的部分。

span.span: The part of the HTML page affected by the style.

summary.span: 由类实现时，它为指定的文档语言元素类型或选择器创建样式规则。

span.span: When implemented by a class, creates a style rule for the specified document language element type, or selector.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建指定的选择器的样式规则。The method creates a style rule for the specified selector. 可以为相同的选择器创建多个样式规则。Multiple style rules can be created for the same selector. 如果`urlResolver`设置为`null`，当前 URL使用实例。If `urlResolver` is set to `null`, the URL of the current instance is used. > [!NOTE] > 不支持添加或修改以编程方式在异步回发期间的样式或样式规则。Adding or modifying styles or style rules programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported. 当将 AJAX 功能添加到 ASP.NET 网页时，异步回发更新页面区域内的而不更新整个页面。When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Microsoft Ajax 概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb)。For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用的实现来演示如何定义一个新对象， `bodyStyle`。The following code example uses the implementation of to demonstrate defining a new object, `bodyStyle`. 然后`bodyStyle`通过调用添加到当前 URL 。Then `bodyStyle` is added to the current URL by calling . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetCreateStyleRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetCreateStyleRule/CS/istylesheetcreatestylerulecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetCreateStyleRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetCreateStyleRule/VB/istylesheetcreatestylerulevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 由类实现时，它将新的样式规则添加至网页的 部分中的嵌入样式表。

span.span: When implemented by a class, adds a new style rule to the embedded style sheet in the section of a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将添加新的样式规则和属性名称设置为中的嵌入式的样式表``一部分对象，并将该规则的自动生成样式名与相关联。This method adds a new style rule and property name to the embedded style sheet within the `` section of a object, and associates the rule with an auto-generated style name. 使用指定呈现对象`urlResolver`参数。The object is rendered using the specified `urlResolver` parameter. 如果`urlResolver`设置为`null`，当前 URL使用。If `urlResolver` is set to `null`, the URL of the current is used. 如果已注册对象，将不会添加多个时间。If a object is already registered, it is not added multiple times. > [!NOTE] > 不支持添加或以编程方式在异步回发期间修改样式。Adding or modifying styles programmatically during asynchronous postbacks is not supported. 当将 AJAX 功能添加到 ASP.NET 网页时，异步回发更新页面区域内的而不更新整个页面。When you add AJAX capabilities to an ASP.NET Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Microsoft Ajax 概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb)。For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用的实现若要演示如何创建自定义对象， `labelStyle`，其注册为当前的位置 (URL)。The following code example uses the implementation of to demonstrate creating a custom object, `labelStyle`, and then registering it for the current location (URL). 然后`label1`标签调用方法，以便`labelStyle`样式应用于`label1`标签。Then the `label1` label calls the method so that the `labelStyle` style is applied to the `label1` label. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetRegisterStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetRegisterStyle/CS/istylesheetregisterstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetRegisterStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IStyleSheetRegisterStyle/VB/istylesheetregisterstylevb.aspx#1)]
